Date.description: The date of the recorded share price

Open.description: The opening share price for the day

High.description: The highest recorded share price for the day

Low.description: The lowest recorded share price for the day

Close.description: The closing share price for the day

Adj Close.description: The adjusted closing share price for the day, accounting for any corporate actions

Volume.description: The number of shares traded during the day

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in stock market analysis.
